headline: Is ConocoPhillips Set for a Rebound After Its Latest Energy Sector Acquisitions?
summary: Ever wondered if now is the right time to dive into ConocoPhillips stock? Let’s break down what the numbers and recent events say about its true value. The share price has had a choppy ride lately. It slipped 1.2% in the last week, ticked up 1.1% over the past month, but is still down 12.1% for the year to date and 19.8% over the last twelve months. Recent news has focused on ConocoPhillips’ major moves in the energy sector, including acquisitions aimed at strengthening its core business and...
